name: TONLE SAP SUSTAINABLE LIVELIHOODS (ADF)
info: The impact of the Project will be improved livelihoods. The outcome of the Project will be increased access to assets in the five provinces that adjoin the Tonle Sap. The project area encompasses the buffer zone and core areas. Specifically, it covers 37 communes, comprising 316 villages with a population of 287,430 in 54,857 families. These communes qualify because they pursue livelihood activities in the buffer zone.
